quiz.question: Which country enforces a law forbidding selling televisions without a license in certain historical contexts?
Where is it illegal to ride a motorcycle without a shirt under some traffic safety rules?
Which European nation bans unaccompanied minors from accessing certain online gambling services under age-protection laws?
Which European country has strict laws about feeding wild animals like pigeons in certain cities?
In which country is it illegal to own just one guinea pig because they are considered social animals in some local laws?
Which nation has municipal rules that ban feeding stray cats in certain historic centers to protect monuments and public health?
Which country once made it illegal to step on money because it features the monarch's image?
Which country has laws prohibiting wearing clothing that conceals the face in public in some regions?
In which Scandinavian country did municipalities create laws forbidding shoe removal in certain public businesses to prevent hygiene issues?
Which country once made it illegal to walk a cow down the main street without a permit in some rural bylaws?
Which country prohibits slot machines and gambling devices in many public places under strict regulations?
Which nation prohibits moving house without notifying local authorities in some registry systems to maintain population records?
In which country is it illegal to walk an elephant down the street without permission in some municipalities?
Which U.S. city had an ordinance forbidding wearing masks at protests during certain historical periods?
Which country prohibits using real currency as jewelry or clothing decoration to protect national insignia under desecration laws?
